studySection.title: Letter Study
studySection.description: Learn to write letters correctly using the interactive drawing mode. The system will analyze your attempts and provide feedback on writing accuracy.

reviewSection.title: Reinforce Learning
reviewSection.description: Practice writing letters without hints to strengthen your skills. Get detailed analysis of your results and improve your writing technique.

compareSection.title: Free Mode
compareSection.description: Upload your own letter images for practice. Ideal for working with specific letters or special fonts.

comparePage.instructions: Take a photo of letter and then press button "upload"

404Page.title: This page is outside of the universe.
404Page.description: The page you are trying to access doesn't exist or has been moved. Try going back to our homepage.
